snippet.title: Tobe & Friends Hookshot Escape Trailer
snippet.description:
JOIN TOBE & FRIENDS IN THEIR DARING ESCAPE!
http://www.secretbase.com.sg/hookshot-escape/

Trapped in the crumbling cave, Tobe and friends have to try their best to survive this endless escape with their own unique abilty, while trying their best to unlock the many treasures the adventure has to offer. Tobe & Friends Hookshot Escape is a retro endless platformer, a return to arcade high score maddness and a love letter to our childhood.

FEATURES 
- 4 Different Play Styles - Featuring 4 different characters, each armed with their own unique ability and combo mechanic. Hookshot, Hammer, Dragon Punch and Feather Cape, each changes how the game is played.

- 4 Different Themes & BGM -- 4 beautiful pixel world, each complete with it's own catchy music.

- 20 Unlockable Equipment -- Over 20 equipment to be unlock, these equipment increases your stats, scores, ability and much more. Mix and match to find your most suitable play style.

- Character Leaderboard -- A total of 5 leaderboards, one for each character, and an additional for the overall highscore.

LET THE ADVENTURE BEGINS!
